name: Escape Together (itch) (NoTitleGames)
description:
In search of a new planet, Earth has sent out 2 robots to explore alien worlds.
But the newly discovered world holds dangers: Drones attack our robots.
To escape the hostile world, our robots must work together: The shovel robot must collect the pink fuel ores, while the protector robot fends off the attacks of the enemy drones.
Only together can the robots manage to fully recharge the rocket and escape the world!

Controls:

Shovel-Robot:
WASD = Move around

Protector-Robot:
Arrow-Keys = Move around
Space / CTRL = Shoot

Credits:

3D Assets: FantasyHavenAssets (https://fantasyhavenassets.com/)
Programming: NoTitleGames (https://gamejolt.com/@NoTitleGames)
Music: Forgenheim (https://www.jamendo.com/artist/366108/forgenheim/albums)

Made together with FantasyHavenAssets for the Mini-Game-Jam #15 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jame-gam-15)
